statements: DELETE FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 AND feedback_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 AND feedback_rating > 3;
DELETE FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND user_id = 200;
DELETE FROM social_media_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 1 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 AND feedback_text LIKE '%great%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%';
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE user_id = 100 AND feedback_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 101 AND sentiment_score < 0.5
DELETE FROM reactions WHERE post_id = 123 AND user_id = 456;
